summary: Completed full implementation of Blog Post migration with pixel-perfect WordPress-to-Laravel features. Created migration for reading_time, is_featured, and primary_category_id fields. Updated Post model with new relationships, HasTags trait, and comprehensive SEO schema using SchemaCollection::addArticle(). Created PostObserver for automatic reading time calculation (200 words/min) and auto-excerpt generation (160 chars). Built TocGenerator service with robust UTF-8 handling for Persian text using DOMDocument with proper encoding. Refactored PostResource to use Split layout with main content area and sidebar. Updated PostController to inject TocGenerator and parse content before rendering. Created comprehensive show.blade.php view with breadcrumbs (Schema.org JSON-LD), hero header with author/meta/reading time badge, responsive grid layout with content column and sticky TOC sidebar, related posts widget, tags section, author bio box, and comments section. Installed hekmatinasser/verta package (v8.5) for Jalali date formatting. Ran all migrations successfully. Updated IMPLEMENTATION_STATUS.md with Phase 8 documentation. All components follow Laravel 12 and Filament v3 best practices with RTL support.
current_status: Implementation complete and migrations executed. All phases executed: Phase 1 (Database & Model), Phase 2 (TOC Generator), Phase 3 (Filament Resource), Phase 4 (Frontend), Phase 5 (Dependencies). Migrations applied successfully. Package hekmatinasser/verta v8.5 installed. IMPLEMENTATION_STATUS.md updated with comprehensive Phase 8 documentation. Ready for testing. Next steps: Test TOC generation with Persian content, verify SEO schema output, test responsive layout, and validate RTL rendering.
